EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as webpage <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink:default=edit me}}]]> <[[https://www.alcatel-lucent.com/]]> The Economic Impact of NFV and SDN on Your Network and Business Strategy <[[https://event.on24.com/]]> June 24, 2015 at 10:00 a.m. EDT/ 16:00 CET Register today <[[https://event.on24.com/]]> The excitement over NFV and SDN has created renewed interest in the networking business and has fanned debate regarding potential winners and losers. But the analysis of the potential economic and competitive impacts of these technologies has been limited to date.
Arthur D. Little and Bell Labs <[[http://www.bell-labs.com/]]> have issued a groundbreaking report <[[http://www2.alcatel-lucent.com/landing/bell-labs/adl/]]> designed to fill the analysis gap and address the impact of NFV and SDN on the network, operations and your bottom line.
Topics Covered:
In this joint live webinar, Arthur D. Little and Bell Labs will discuss:
- Research and outcomes from the report - Key actions and strategies that operators should adopt to navigate the transformed market landscape - The value of fusing carrier networks with the cloud ecosystem, as enabled by NFV and SDN technologies
Who Should Attend?
The webinar is intended for executives and service provider professionals focused on determining business and network strategies for NFV and SDN. Register today <[[https://event.on24.com/]]> Speakers: Name
